metadata.title: CVE-2024-50126 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: sched: use RCU read-side critical section in taprio_dump()Fix possible use-after-free in 'taprio_dump()' by adding RCUread-side critical section there.
